data.content:
Danh từ
the Diaspora
sự định cư người Do Thái; vùng định cư người Do Thái

noun
or Diaspora , pl -ras
[count] formal :a group of people who live outside the area in which they had lived for a long time or in which their ancestors lived - usually singular
the art of the African/Chinese diaspora
members of the Diaspora [=Jewish people throughout the world who do not live in Israel]
